CustomField.formula: IF(LEN( Residence__r.Address_Street__c )>0, Residence__r.Address_Street__c& " " , "" ) & BR() & IF(LEN( Residence__r.Address_City__c )>0, Residence__r.Address_City__c& ", " , "" )& IF(LEN( Residence__r.Address_State__c )>0, Residence__r.Address_State__c& " " , "" )& IF(LEN( Residence__r.Address_Zip_Code__c )>0, Residence__r.Address_Zip_Code__c,"")
CustomField.label: Property Address
